EmailTemplate.textOnly:
HeadStart | The Challenge
Applications have now opened for the HeadStart programme. Applications will close on Sunday 12th October 2014.
First come first serve!
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
This is your chance to continue your NCS journey with The Challenge through HeadStart. HeadStart has been designed especially to help you gain experience and get ahead.
Think you can volunteer 16 hours or more?
Want to get ahead and learn new skills?
Want an interview for a part-time paid job with New Look or Starbucks?
Sign up to HeadStart!
How to apply
If you have decided to find your own opportunity
Click on your unique application link below. Do not forward this to anyone else, as this application is specific to you, so if you send it to a friend their application may overwrite yours. Once you have completed the form press ‘submit’.
If you are selecting an opportunity identified by us
You will need to login to The Challenge Society website to read through our opportunities.
Here is your username and password to login: Username: {!Contact.Email} Password: {!Contact.Login_Password__c}
This will take you to your profile page
Click on Opportunities and then ‘browse all’
Click on ‘Borough’ enter in the Borough you want to volunteer in, for example Camden
Click on the HeadStart opportunities that interests you the most and have a read
Don’t forget to check the address to see if you can travel there ok.
Fill out the application online and submit.
All applicants click here to fill out your unique application. Deadline is 12th October 2014
What’s next?
If you have been successful with your application we will give you a call before Kick Off to discuss your options, you will then receive a confirmation email along with an invitation to our kick-off event on 25th October at the University of West London Students’ Union (keep this date free!) which will include workshop 1. This will contribute to 1 hour of your volunteering hours.
If you have any questions feel free to email us at headstart@the-challenge.org or contact us on our facebook page /Londonheadstart.
We look forward to receiving your application!
The HeadStart London team
